citations.narrative:
The water receptacle in the coati enclosure has grime inside of it. Dirty water receptacles can harbor organisms that can
cause disease in animals. The licensee must ensure that water receptacles are cleaned and sanitized as often as
necessary to prevent contamination of the water.
To be corrected by September 3, 2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensees.
End Section

narrative:
3.130 
   
Watering. 
The water receptacle in the coati enclosure has grime inside of it.  Dirty water receptacles can harbor organisms that can 
cause disease in animals.  The licensee must ensure that water receptacles are cleaned and sanitized as often as 
necessary to prevent contamination of the water. 
To be corrected by September 3, 2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensees. 
 
End Section
